issue.title: Make RC releases as tagged releases
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14507](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14507). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When we make RC releases, we should also make a tagged release on NPM instead of a full release. http://npm.github.io/publishing-pkgs-docs/updating/using-tags.html
